resources.string: This app need admin permission to block screen during calls
I\'ve created this simple app because my Xiaomi Redmi has some bug during call and my face close the call or mute the mic accidentally.\nHope you will like.\nNo root needed
This app need some extra permission to lock the screen and prevent this annoying issue.
ALLOW PERMISSION AND START SENSOR FIX
If you don\'t want the notification fixed in status bar long press on it and disable the notification. The app will continue work
Sadly for Android security, this app will not work without this permission. As seen in the allow screen we only use block screen feature
Double check you conceed required permission
If you liked this app, please donate me a coffee
You need to enable autostart permission
Grant permission to access the state of the phone and find out if it is on the phone
Check this box if you want to use also the Light Sensor to detect the ear near the phone
To uninstall the app you have to remove Administration Permission before
Disable MIUI battery optimization to prevent the app is closed from OS
This app need accessibility permission to block screen during call, select ProximitySensorFix from the list and enable Accessibility features
Use Administration mode instead of Accessibility
Some devices works better with Administration mode and others can\'t unlock screen with fingerprint
